title: Man Dark Skin Tone Red Hair
alsoKnownAs: Red Haired Man Dark Skin Tone
description: A man with dark skin tone and red hair. This emoji represents a person with a distinct look, used for self-expression, to describe individuals, or in conversations about hair color and identity.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the 'man with dark skin tone and red hair' emoji offers a distinctive and vibrant portrait. Apple's design language brings this individual to life with rich, glossy 3D shading and subtle highlights that emphasize the fiery hue of his hair and the warmth of his skin tone. This emoji, rendered with realistic lighting and soft rounded edges, provides a unique representation for individuals with these specific features, adding a personalized touch to conversations on Apple devices.
